title: Geraint Thomas warns Vingegaard, Roglič might attack Sepp Kuss: ‘I won’t be surprised if they did’
content:
The 2018 Tour de France winner also faced a similar scenario with Chris Froome: 'Vingegaard didn't come here to ride around, did he? Same with Primož.'

Read the full article at Geraint Thomas warns Vingegaard, Roglič might attack Sepp Kuss: ‘I won’t be surprised if they did’ on Velo.
author: ahood
